content.rendered:
One piece of cabin baggage (maximum 8kg) for free. If you travel on a FLEX ticket you can bring up to two pieces of baggage up to 23 kg per piece.

Atlantic Airways Checked Baggage

Atlantic Airways Excess Baggage

excerpt.rendered: One piece of cabin baggage (maximum 8kg) for free. If you travel on a FLEX ticket you can bring up to two pieces of baggage up to 23 kg per piece. Atlantic Airways Checked Baggage Atlantic Airways Excess Baggage
